name: 怨島太郎 Urashima Shadow
description:
Shoot'em up based on a Japanese fairy tale ～ STORY ～

Once upon a time, there was a young man named "Urashima Taro".
One day, as Taro was walking along the beach, he saw a turtle being bullied by children.
Taro felt sorry for the turtle, so he protected it from the children and returned it to the sea.

A few days later, the turtle appeared to Taro again.
He told Princess "Otohime" of the Ryugu castle about you, and she said she would love to have you in her castle.　
Taro accepted the invitation and rode on the turtle's back to the Ryugu castle at the bottom of the sea.

At the Ryugu castle, Taro was entertained with many delicacies and dancing fish, and Otohime gave him a jeweled box as a souvenir.
When Taro returned home, several hundred years had passed on earth, and all of his family and friends were dead.
When he opened the box, smoke came out from inside and instantly turned Taro into an old man.

Taro despaired of being treated so unreasonably, but a mysterious woman named "Yaobikuni" passed by and gave Taro his power, restoring him to the form of a young man.
Taro was deeply grateful to her and vowed to take revenge on Otohime.

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

～CONTROL～

　Keyboard:

 　　WASD or Arrow: Move

　 　Space: Shoot

　 　Esc: Pause

　　 R: Game Reset

　Gamepad(xbox):

 　　D-pad or Left Stick: Move

 　　A or RT: Shoot

 　　Menu button: Pause
